channel.title: Scientist in freezer is driving me insane.
channel.description:
I like how the source engine brings so much interaction with the environment yet the mod tries to limit player interactions.
I started playing trough the mod yet again and this time I decided to try to save as much people as possible I managed to save 3 barneys and 1 scientist and then I saw a scientist in the freezer in the office complex. I tried interacting with the scientist and make her follow me so I can rescue her too but she didn't do anything. I met scientists like this in the mod before but they at least told me they were too scared to go and would prefer to stay and wait while this one just asked me if there were any safe places to get away from the monsters and then nothing else.
So there she was not doing anything and it was like the game was telling me that for some reason Gordon did not want to talk to the scientist and I had no control over that even though the game didn't tell me that I should not bother since the scientist didn't say anything about staying there and waiting and my character was silent for no reason which drives me mad because in the original half-life you could interact with them and they would follow.
And yes I do understand that when a person doesn't want to come with me I shouldn't expect a reaction but she didn't say that she doesn't want to come and I felt my character was being a prick not helping the scientist against his own will.
You could at least give her a line to say like "Now that you have dealt with the monsters I think I would stay here" or "Can you leave me alone" and I will at least understand why she won't come.
Or if you are scared that players will just tell her to follow and then go trough the vents where it's un accessible for npc's you could make her say "I don't want to risk going trough there I think I'll stay here" you already did something like that at the chapter "forget about freeman" where the guard says that he doesn't want to follow you and he will find another way.
And now I feel like the game has taken control out of my hands for no real reason than to make me mad and the scientist is just staying there won't even react when I shoot at her.
Please if you can do something about it because this is seriously breaking the immersion of this great mod. To people who don't care about the npc's this wont mean much but for a guy like me who likes interaction and wants to actually rescue them this is abysmal.

item.title: Scientist in freezer is driving me insane.
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
You do realize what you’re doing is futile in the long term, right? You’ll eventually reach places where you both won’t be able to take the NPCs with you and go back to the previous chapter. Do you think the game keeps track of what the NPCs you left behind are doing? No, they’re literally wiped from memory and you don’t get a special commendation or award in the end. It literally doesn’t matter.

Now, do you really think the devs will give that aspect of the game any special attention? That’s likely way way on their list of priorities.

It’s the kind of minutae detail that concerns you because that’s all you choose to focus on but in the grand scheme of things it’s as terrible an omission as the lack of actual 3D modelled roaches, that is, not very terrible at all.

item.title: Scientist in freezer is driving me insane.
item.dc:creator: snark567
item.description:
Maxey:

First the floating stage emitters thread and now this. What’s next? A thread asking why you can’t pee in the bathroom?

Are we getting invaded by the pedantic army? Get a reality check guys, this is a sci-fi action game not a scientifically correct social simulator…

Things like this break the immersion if you are all about run and gun without giving a damn then good for you but everyone views things differently.

Plus it doesn’t need to be a “scientifically” correct social simulator to give the npc a simple line like “I don’t want to come” It’s like if you are working at a store and suddenly a guy comes running to you saying “Damn I had a really bad day and now I had to run away from the rain” And then he just stands there infront of you and you tell him that the stuff he want’s to buy will cost 5 dollars but he does nothing but stay like a statue until people decide to lift him up and move him outside where he will just stay there because someone forgot to “script” the interaction.

I realise that I sound weird when talking about this stuff but it really is annoying stuff like the guard at the surface tension where the creators didn’t think that the player will save them in time and didn’t add interactions and when you kill the sniper before he kills them the scientist just stands there doing nothing.

At least I hope that simple stuff like this will be fixed for the steam release.
